title: The Last of Us Episode 6 BREAKDOWN (FULL SPOILERS)
description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/kindafunny65 and use code kindafunny65 for 65% off plus free shipping!

Tim Gettys, Greg Miller, and Blessing Adeoye Jr. break down the latest episode of HBO's The Last of Us starring Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey.

New after show analysis LIVE every Monday at 9AM PT on http://youtube.com/kindafunny.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
